alert.note: Alert for McLean; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:14PM CDT until May 07 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR EASTERN WOODFORD...SOUTHEASTERN TAZEWELL AND CENTRAL MCLEAN COUNTIES... At 912 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Danvers, or 8 miles west of Bloomington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bloomington and Normal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 16 and 24. Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 24. Interstate 55 between mile markers 145 and 186. Interstate 74 between mile markers 109 and 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
